name: Debbie Pehr
bio: Debbie Pehr is a freshman from Austin studying Neuroscience, preparing to go into medical research. In high school, she served as the President of her local Jewish youth group. During this time, she planned events for groups as small as 4 and as big as 150. Debbie spends time writing letters, travelling, being a political activist, and telling people customer horror stories from her time working at Whataburger. Eager to share her passion about the potential of AI, Debbie is excited to be your Director of Industry and Events!
